DOC.brief_summary: Stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) prevalent among woman . SUI characterize loss urine increase abdominal pressure cause coughing , laugh , sneeze , run , lift walking . SUI cause woman avoid routine physical activity , thus detract significantly quality life . The purpose study evaluate performance new design TIPI device , conservative , disposable , treatment temporary management SUI .
DOC.brief_title: Preliminary Performance Study New TIPI Device Prevention Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.criteria: Females age 18 60 year Had ≥ 1 delivery Suffering genuine stress urinary incontinence confirm urodynamic testing ( Urodynamic stress urinary incontinence ) normal void without abnormal residual urine Baseline PWG ( usage TIPI device ) ≥ 6gr/8hrs Average reduction urinary incontinence least 70 % follow 3 day usage clear TIPI G3 device The patient ability understand nature study give consent sign write informed consent form . Successful experience use vaginal tampon Willing undergo urodynamic investigation Normal pap smear within past 24 month Patient able agrees arrive study site area period 46 hour 612 non consequent study day . Patient pregnant , suspect pregnant planning pregnant course study Patients present suspect urinary infection Patients present suspect vaginal infection Severely atrophic vagina Women manage insert vaginal tampon , reason , past Abnormal vaginal bleeding Patient currently participate another clinical study may directly indirectly affect result study Was/is treat urinary incontinence mean medication , surgical intervention etc . might influence study result Vaginal wall prolapse type reach level introitus ( grade 2 ) Comorbid condition ( ) could limit patient 's ability participate study , impact scientific integrity study
